pages.title: Fragment Splice
pages.text: $(byellow)Fragment Splice$() is a machine that can $(bred)combine plant enjoy card into plant card$(). All Recipes are similar, if you want to carft a plant card, $(bred)you need 8 its enjoy cards, 16 its essences, 1 card template and 1000 sun$(). Such as PeaShooter Card, you need prepare 8 PeaShooter Enjoy Card, 16 Appease Essences, 1 Gray Card and 1000 sun.
